an5.125:1: "Bhikkhus, there are these five things that reduce vitality. What five? One does what is harmful; one does not observe moderation in what is beneficial; one has poor digestion; one walksfor almsat an improper time;[n.26]Sn 386suggests thatakālacārīrefers to walking for alms at an improper time.one is not celibate. These are the five things that reduce vitality.
an5.125:2: "Bhikkhus, there are these five things that increase vitality. What five? One does what is beneficial; one observes moderation in what is beneficial; one has good digestion; one walksfor almsat the proper time; one is celibate. These are the five things that increase vitality."
